title: Sans Serif Capitals
content:
This is an edited photograph of a print. The client requests an exact match. The closest I have found is [Wearetrippin Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417080921/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/wearetrippin/display/glyphs.html), but the sample is heavier. Apparently they are matching an existing stencil.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417080921im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RESVD-01_3555.jpg)
author: AcousticWonder

comments.content: Same designer Tsunekawa Ryoichi, different (?) font [Bebas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417080921/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/bebas) (not [Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417080921/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/bebas)) but same issue with boldness. Edited?
